title: Senior Devops Engineer
summary: Devops engineer for team at a large govenment bank.
responsibilities: Devops: Wrote infrastructure as code for a federal financial institution using Typescript CDK, Gitlab, Bash, including unit, integration and snapshot tests
Application Development: Python Serverless application development using Lambda, SQS, SNS, S3, Eventbridge, DynamdoDB.

Build and Release Management: Creating and maintaining deployment pipelines. Pipelines integrated Angular, Java, Python applications with AWS services and deployed them to ECS. Established and implemented quality gates to "shift left" problem detection to earlier in the development lifecycle.
Big Data: Also participated in short project using AWS Glue.
